radiographic_examinations.findings: Possible nodular opacity in the right upper lobe.
Bilateral patchy consolidation with peripheral ground-glass opacities.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: CT following extubation showed marked improvement of the areas of nodularity and ground-glass throughout the lungs, with residual opacities in the right upper lobe and left lung base.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Findings consistent with acute respiratory distress syndrome.
